name: FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN' Scratch Engine
description:
There is a glitch where the promt to change a keybing will stay up after you have changed all keybinds, to fix this just scroll on the page.

Hi. I made this engine in scratch. Well yes and no. The original version of this engine was made on scratch by a user named Shimish21. It was kinda laggy and bare bones.  So i made this version of it. 

Link to scratch version of engine: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/760293204/

Link to Shimish21 version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/535973006

Its really bad still but its something I will work on as a joke.

Credit to the original FNF team for all the assets and ideas.

Credit to Philiplol for the version of Daddy's songs used in the engine.

Some of the assets are from Psych Engine, like the credits menu icon.

Anyway enjoy!
